The certificates are valid and have appropriate validity dates. This is consistent with legitimate business practices and helps establish the website's authenticity. With the information gathered so far, the website appears to be legitimate. To be thorough, I will check for any negative feedback or scam reports related to the website.

There are no relevant results on Twitter regarding Lewis Investment being a scam. This lack of negative feedback in such a public forum further suggests that the website may not be a scam. I now know the final answer. The website https://www.lewisinvestment.co.uk/ does not appear to be a scam.
